entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 a.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2Â°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
